productos.descripcion: The FFT lightweight Carbon Gripper is 40% lighter than conventional gripping systems and combines a modular ultra-lightweight design with a monolithic customized frame structure for the highest geometrical requirements.
The FFT lightweight FibreTEC 3D is our approach for cost-efficient modular lightweight components.
The FFT lightweight FibreTEC Profile is a lighter alternative to aluminum profiles and is available in lengths up to 6 m.
The FFT lightweight FibreTEC Connectors ensure maximum simplicity for assembling our profiles.
